mapper.select: SELECT * FROM t_owner WHERE pk = ( SELECT owner_pk FROM t_rstrnt WHERE pk = #{r_pk} )
SELECT pw, enabled AS rstrnt_enabled, r.pk as rstrnt_pk FROM t_owner AS o JOIN t_rstrnt AS r ON o.pk = owner_pk WHERE email = #{email}
SELECT pk, seq, headcount, contact, regdate, process_status FROM t_reserv WHERE rstrnt_pk = #{pk} AND (process_status = 0 OR process_status = 1) ORDER BY process_status DESC, last_update DESC
